00001 /**************************************************************************
00002 $Header: WN_CLEAR.C Fri 10-27-2000 9:43:56 pm HvA V2.01 $
00003 
00004 DESC: clear window function for HVA_WIN
00005 HIST: 20001027 V2.01 - Adapted for DJGPP
00006 ***************************************************************************/
00007 
00008 /*---------------------------------------
00009   WN_CLEAR.C
00010 ---------------------------------------*/
00011 
00012 #include "video/v_video.h"
00013 #include "window.h"
00014 
00015 
00016 /*#+func-------------------------------------------------------------------
00017    FUNCTION: wn_clear()
00018     PURPOSE: Clear contents of a window
00019      SYNTAX: int wn_clear(WINDOW *w);
00020 DESCRIPTION: -
00021     RETURNS: NO_WINDOW if no window opened
00022              TRUE      if all ok
00023     HISTORY: 910718 V0.1 - Initial version
00024 --#-func-------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00025 int wn_clear(WINDOW *w)
00026 {
00027   int l,h;
00028 
00029   wn_log("wn_clear(%p,%s) (%d,%d) x2=%d  y2=%d\n",w,w->title,w->y1,w->x1,w->x2,w->y2);
00030 
00031   /*----------------------------------------
00032     Check if window opened and top window.
00033   -----------------------------------------*/
00034   if (!w)
00035     return(NO_WINDOW);
00036   if (w != top_window)
00037     wn_top(w);
00038 
00039   /*-----------------------------------------------------
00040     Clear window by filling in attribute and SPACE's and
00041     Put cursor in upper-right corner of window
00042   -------------------------------------------------------*/
00043   l = w->x2 - w->x1 + 1;
00044   h = w->y2 - w->y1 + 1;
00045   wn_log("l=%d   h=%d   color=%d   \n",l,h,w->wcolor);
00046   v_fillarea(w->y1,w->x1,l,h,' ',w->wcolor);
00047   wn_locate(w,0,0);
00048 
00049   return(TRUE);
00050 }
